website_summaries.verdict: This bed fits most sedans and SUVs, although in longer vehicles you may need to prop up the end with your road-tripping accessories.
pros: May not fit longer cars, trucks, and mini buses, so be sure to measure
Adults can rest overnight or nap, although size is best for children and pets
cons: In a van or longer car, you may have to use items to hold up the end where your legs rest

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this mattress!! It works perfectly in the back seat of a Chevy Silverado! The electric air pump is quick and easy to use...I even brought bedding to use with it and it is just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fot for my 2 dogs.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time leaving a review but this mattress came in so handy for my 85-90 pounds German Shephered and my 6 months boxer (35-38 pounds) I tried go show in the pictures all the space they have, my boyfriend took no more than 3 minutes to set it up in the car. Last month we had a sudden trip over the weekend and they were so uncomfortable, this time they're loving the ride. It fits perfetly in my 2017 Volkswagen Jetta.
customer_reviews.author: Fiorela

customer_reviews.title: GOOD
customer_reviews.text: this is what I looked for. this is perfect. I have 2011 Sienna Le AWD and is perfect fit. I installed in a 3rd row seat. I doubt about lost air within 8 hours. I read many reviews, but the reviews hesitated me to purchase this. I think they might got bad one. mine no air lose at all. I added more air after 2 days later. it was not flat at all. it lose only 15-20 % air. that is not bad to compare with other reviews. I am very satisfied to purchase this. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: KIWI

customer_reviews.title: The pump that came with it worked great to inflate it faster
customer_reviews.text: On a recent car trip (13 hours), I got this ahead of time so it would be easier to switch out drivers who wanted to sleep. It worked. I don’t care for the inflatable pillow it came with and I forgot my pillows I bought at the relatives. Also, we had to stack some backpacks and various items underneath the area that the feet normally rest in, because the van we had it set up in was very high off the floor. A couple people did sleep though, and we managed to finish the trip in one day. The pump that came with it worked great to inflate it faster.
customer_reviews.author: Mariner Blake

customer_reviews.title: All in all it was perfect for the trip we took
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried about the quality of this item, but this did what it was supposed to do. It left a half foot of space on one end of our Dodge 2500, but that's a big truck. All in all it was perfect for the trip we took, allowing the dogs to not fear falling off the back seat, and it was a perfect napping place for me.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: My 6 year old loved it! We used it during our tent camping ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this inside of a 2015 Chevy Spark! My 6 year old loved it! We used it during our tent camping adventure from the west coast to the east coast! When not used in the car we used it in the tent as a sleeping mattress and then outside we flipped over on the grass for a small sofa using the two fillers as back cushions. Still holding up after 1 month of use!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Cappy

customer_reviews.title: Defective pump, poor quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality and defective pump. I purchased this inflatable bed not only the bed itself showed some imperfections on the seams but once it was connected the pump was shocked. I returned the item and until bow have not yet received my refund bor a replacement. Not the best purchase experience nor the quality that should be.
customer_reviews.author: jcmojzis

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit the back of a Chevy Silverado
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews of people using it in their truck I went ahead and bought this for our Chevy Silverado with the crew cab. It doesn't appear to quite stretch the distance and seems more suited to a car. Right now I am trying to decide if I should send it back... I hate to send it back because we inflated it to test it before going on a trip and obviously can't fold it to look new again. Plus, there is really nothing wrong with it except that it is not as big as I thought. It came with the mattress, pump, a carrying bag and 2 sleep masks.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Holy car ride Batman!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for long road trips for our family and one small dog. It’s perfect in my Acadia! I laid the middle seats down blew this up for the backseat put a nice thick comforter over it to protect from puppy nails. It laid my daughter(90lbs and 5’), husband(200lb 6’), and puppy(10lb 3’) and hubs and I switched a couple of times (125lbs 5’4”) so after 10 hours in the car and a switch or two it was a little flat, however this was a HUGE game changer for traveling with kids and dog and a mom who wants to see all the crazy road side attractions! I can’t wait to use on the next car trip.
customer_reviews.author: John Roeser

customer_reviews.title: Great backseat bed!
customer_reviews.text: Great for a quick nap on the road! It fits my Toyota Corolla perfectly! No bad chemical smell. It came with the mattress, carry bag, 2 pillows, patch kit, 12-volt compressor with 3 different nozzles, and even 2 eye masks! I also recommend the car window shades  and the USB/battery powered fan
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: List of Cars this product is good for.
customer_reviews.text: Fits in my car, barley. I need to fill it with 70% of air instead of full for it to fit but its sturdy. Good product. Suggestions. Slightly fills to big on the low compartment of the bed. I would not suggest this for - Subaru wrx(07-15), Lancer(05-15) Evolution(07-15) Prius Mirage Eclipse Scion tc Mini Cooper Gti golf I would suggest this for Toyota Altimas Toyota Camry BMW m3-m5 All full cabin trucks.(yes that means chevys also) Crown Victorian Chrysler vehicles in general -maybe a mustang.
customer_reviews.author: sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the purchase of this air matress. Bought about a couple months ago for when we were traveling long distances. 1st night it held air well, second night it held well too, however third time we went to sleep on it next morning it was deflated. Assuming it had a hole, which would be hard to get, we finally stuck it in the tub to see where it was leaking from. There were 2 holes. One on the top in a crack, and one at the back on a seam. Seems like the creases are what tear easily. Needs to be better made.
customer_reviews.author: Laparks

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! My kids enjoyed sitting and napping on this. I even took a nap on it and it's very comfy. The bottom portion was a little short for my 2014 Nissan Rogue, but with enough air and the middle portion up, it worked. I would definitely purchase this again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Slept every night in comfort
customer_reviews.text: I used this during the Summer while traveling with a carnival, so I was sleeping in it every night for weeks. It's so comfortable! I was traveling in a Ford F150 Sport, so I had a little room down by my feet for storing my shoes and stuff, but I normally drive a Chevy Blazer and this would fit perfectly in there. I don't drive cars, so I can't give any review about that, but for larger vehicles this is a must. In fact, if you regularly sleep in your vehicle -- whether due to travel, camping, or lack of housing, I highly recommend investing in this.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Great for taking someone home from the hospital
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I bought this because my mom had to have surgery and we had about an hour to drive to get home, she said it was very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sedia

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I travel out of state for medical care due to an acute illness. The drive always sends me into a pain cycle that is extremely difficult to control. This air mattress allows me to take breaks and lay down cutting out fatigue and pain from my condition. It is very thin, I can still feel the seat belt underneath a little bit but overall is effective in what I need it for! I will probably upgrade to a thicker one in the future. I will say it fit my backseat perfectly, a Nissan Sentra, so would be small for any bigger backseat than that. Also I am only 5'3" so anyone taller might not be as comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Castle Bryant

customer_reviews.title: It’s great just needs a few updates.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our Toyota Avalon. Fit perfectly. Pretty easy to blow up. It would have been nice if the cord for the air was longer. But it blew up pretty quickly. After being in the car for a day it seemed to deflate a bit. So the air doesn’t last long which is lame. It is comfortable. Fit both me 5’6 and my husband 6’2 comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: First trip failure.
customer_reviews.text: Does not hold air in the actual matress part. The chambers that go to the floor will hold air but the actual matress becomes deflated despite making sure the valves are sealed. The first time we used it and we were disappointed. We make lots of trips in our van and had great hopes for the matress. Unfortunately it's not good for long.
customer_reviews.author: M. Emmerich

customer_reviews.title: 2” thin, weight limit 150 lbs
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in pics and it’s a clever design. It inflated just fine. BUT, the mattress is only 2 inches high, so it’s minimally comfortable for a person to sleep on. Other air mattresses go to 6-10” high. Weight limit: only 150lbs = maybe a thin adult OR a couple of kids. Our son plans to put a hammock over the mattress so our grandpuppy will be more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lewie D

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2005 highlander. I am disappointed in this mattress. It was difficult to close the value for the main mattress part on the bottom. My main complaint is that the size of the mattress itself was not wide enough to fit/fill in the space needed. I ended up having to prop pillows against the seats to keep from rolling into the gap between were the mattress ended and the seat backs. This was really disappointing for me. It's supposed to be a moderately comfortable design, right? I guess you get what you pay for. It will get by, but I would not recommend it as a first choice or any that look like it.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Týr

customer_reviews.title: I love this product and wish I'd had it years ago as a younger traveller!
customer_reviews.text: I had planned on taking a trip, by myself, to Florida and it would normally take two days. I didn't want stay at a hotel so I thought I'd try this. It worked great! I was so tickled that I took another two day trip and used it again! Where was this when I was younger and took far more trips? LOL
customer_reviews.author: Mini

customer_reviews.title: Awful, deflates completely. Should have listened to reviews!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Deflated significantly after less than an hour with nobody on it, and then had absolutely no air in it while sleeping even after refilling and checking the valve caps twice. I am certain I was using the product correctly. Was totally useless and left me car camping in the tiny back seat with no comfort or extra sleeping space. Ruined trip. Go for a better reviewed and more expensive/durable one.
customer_reviews.author: Kris97

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This was worth every penny. I still can’t believe I only paid $30. We’re takings long road trip in a few weeks and this will make it so much easier. It fits pretty well in my Nissan NV. Definitely will need a couple extra pillows at the top to fill the gap between the mattress and the car but that’s easy. Had to move the driver seat forward a bit to make it fit a narrow space. I’d buy it again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Tanner

customer_reviews.title: doesn't keep air.
customer_reviews.text: I love this idea! My dog also loved! Unfortunately, it doesn't keep air. My golden is only about 65 lbs. i can only imagine if a human were to use it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk. It sprung a leak in a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap junk. It sprung a leak in a couple weeks from nothing more than being slept on. I found the hole and patched it... But a day later it developed a new leak that I can't find. I would purchase a different brand of I were you.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Cool idea, deflated before we made it to destination
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a road trip through the night from Michigan to florida , we made it half way there before it completely deflated with a huge hole in it. Wasnt even able to get a full use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittnay

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for my car
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t fit well and i tried it on 3 cars and a truck and if you laid on the floor part it always fell over. It is fairly thin and it didn’t work for us but we have 2honda accords and a Toyota Camry if that helps judge the sizing. It does blow up very fast And never lost air , also we use it now on the floor upside down to watch tv so it does have multiple functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Shonia

customer_reviews.title: Not for our Durango captain seats
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't fit the back seat captain chairs in our 2019 Durgano. The seats are angled differently than a bench seat. The 3rd row bench seating is too small to fit the bed. I wanted this to work out so bad. I wish I had taken a picture. Nice quality bed. Loved that it came with a pump with a 12-volt DC power plug. The bag was cheap and the handles broke as I put the bed back in the bag for returning.
customer_reviews.author: Lorreen Serls

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste money on this
customer_reviews.text: Not as Beautiful as they show it on the photo of course. It's Extremely Small and barely gets the Concept job done. I am not Satisfied. You are basically paying more for the Pump then anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold the air even for a night!
customer_reviews.text: We used it for 4 days straight and not even a single day it held the air for whole night which is the most important job of this product. Its not an ideal fit for my Infiniti car but can make it work. I realized its really hard to sleep for whole night, but can only rely for a quick nap.
customer_reviews.author: vpshastry

customer_reviews.title: I slept comfortably on it
customer_reviews.text: This mattress fit perfectly in the back of my '16 Subaru Crosstrek. I slept comfortably on it, although I did wake up with it slightly deflated. It inflates quickly but can be hard to inflate and move to the backseat.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea B. Hartman

customer_reviews.title: perfect for long car rides
customer_reviews.text: i used this in my 2015 honda civic ex. it fits the back perfectly and even comes with two inflateable pillows and eye covers. it was perfect for the long drive from NJ to FL, my girlfriend and i took turns driving and sleeping all the way there. highly recommend this product, it also holds air very well and comes with a repair patch if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Feltrin

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Maintained its inflation and very much helped on our roadtrip. It is the width of a sedan so if you are a taller person you will have to scrunch a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Brianne Riggin-Pahtak

customer_reviews.title: Good value for price
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price. Got this for when we travel so 1 can drive and 1 can sleep. Works pretty good for its intended purpose. Just follow the instructions that come with it and you will never have a problem.
customer_reviews.author: $$ J-Money $$

customer_reviews.title: Wish it worked
customer_reviews.text: I drive a 2018 civic and it fits fine in the back seat with the front seats moved up a bit. Had it for a couple nights and it deflated within a few hours. Kept having to constantly refill the mattress which was just very annoying. Pump worked just fine it was the mattress that just didn’t seem to stay up
customer_reviews.author: Guadalupe Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I like this, it's really nice and fits well in my car. I was foolish to think it would fit 2 people tho. The two pillows in the picture are misleading. It fits one person. Absolutely no way to fit 2 unless they are children
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: This has been the perfect solution to my short/long travel
customer_reviews.text: This has been the perfect solution to my short/long travel. Now commutes are not quite as painful as before. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Air escapes quick when trying to close the air hole!!
customer_reviews.text: The idea of this was fantastic. Blowing it up was easy but when it came time to close the hole after you take the inflator piece out, the air quickly escapes and the mattress deflates! So I could never get the proper air I wanted bc of how quickly the air escaped when trying to close. We also tried to get 2 of us on here and it didn’t work the way we thought it would. Not sure if I would try to use this on our next trip or not.....
customer_reviews.author: Sporty Steve

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit a sedan backseat, won’t lay flat
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit back of 2019 Jetta - the part that fits to the console is too big and this does not fit into the backseat well at all. It won’t sit flat when fully inflated and deflated itself/loses air throughout the night. Do not recommend unless you already have a spacious SUV or other large vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Bumble & Bumble

customer_reviews.title: Split at the seam
customer_reviews.text: I planned a cross country hotshot trip and needed an air mattress for my backseat. I was pretty excited to not have to spend a lot of money on hotels with the use of this bed. I had nothing under the bed or on top other than pillows/blanket, but two days into my trip it split at the factory seam. I used the patch kit that came with the bed. Due to the split being on the seam, it’s hard to get a great patch. Used it a few more nights and a much bigger hole started on the seam again. Don’t get your hopes up with this one.
customer_reviews.author: JDC67

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully this review saves others some time and money. This mattress will not fit a Honda Accord 2014. The “legs” that are supposed to fit behind the two front seats didn’t even touch the ground. The bed would not reach all the way to the back of the seat, leaving a gap between the mattress and seat. Finally, my center console made it impossible for this to lay flat, but rather caused it to lay at an elevation, where I slide right into the gap created by the mattress not being long enough. Save money and invest in a nicer one.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: On my 3rd time using it, the pump broke, it was midnight, I was exhausted from driving 9 hours after work and devastated. The pump would not turn on but I found it was quite easy to insert air using my mouth. It's brought a lot of comfort in regards to sleeping in my car.
customer_reviews.author: Jamee Choi

customer_reviews.title: It is good for a long road trip or car camping
customer_reviews.text: It is good for a long road trip or car camping. However, if you’re using it for a quick nap in the car between Uber shifts, it’s annoying to inflate and deflate. Easier to just recline your seat.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette Murphy

customer_reviews.title: great car bed
customer_reviews.text: My fiance is a correctional officer and often gets mandated so he has this in his car incase he is too tired and needs to sleep before driving home. He says it is easy to inflate and comfortable enough
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin&Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Great bed!
customer_reviews.text: Have pain issues with traveling. This proved great. I can get in back, make myself comfortable, read, sleep, etc. Can handle the long trips I used to dread. Can relieve my husband behind the wheel knowing that I can look forward to being able to stretch out when done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh...
customer_reviews.text: Took me a few minutes to inflate and it took a lot of maneuvering and I think I should have had another person with me. I take long drives to visit family and thought this would be perfect for the 18 hour drives. Maybe I’ll blow it up at home before going but then again it was kinda uncomfortable and thin. I think I’d rather the back seat or a recliner front seat before this
customer_reviews.author: Abi

customer_reviews.title: 🧐
customer_reviews.text: In general a good idea, but it is not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I love naps
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! I commute for school and work graveyard shifts and this is perfect for napping in between classes!!! I have no choice but to sleep in my car on my school days and at least now it feels like I’m sleeping in a bed and not the backseat of my car. Also super easy to inflate, they give you a pump that connects to your car charging port too and anything else you may need. Even sleep masks 😂
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Gold

customer_reviews.title: Product group not as described. Product itself works as described.
customer_reviews.text: Came with 2 sleep eye-masks, not 2 pillows. Big difference. No wonder it's slightly cheaper than the others with 2 actual inflatable pillows. If you want 2 pillows order somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago A.

customer_reviews.title: Get a air mattress
customer_reviews.text: This product was not as big as I expected. Definitely not big enough for two people! Would work if you were in a crunch and needed it for a short sleeping period.
customer_reviews.author: cbrowell

customer_reviews.title: Get one, now!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome, we used it on a 16 hour road trip and boy was it amazing. My sister used it and was able to sleep for most of the drive and not one did it deflate or lose air one bit. It blew up super quick and easy and it was nice that it came with a pump.
customer_reviews.author: A&J Benavidez

customer_reviews.title: Helps prevent usual car aches
customer_reviews.text: I liked it, although not for me personally. Fits my Nissan versa Note, very snug. Managed to sleep 5 to 6 hours, very little to no soreness . The pillows are alright, I prefer firmness, but they did the job. Sleep position is what determines body soreness at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Perez

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for manufacturing defects
customer_reviews.text: During a test inflation there was a major leak in the bottom section. Used water and soap to find the source of the leak and found a manufacturing defect. First picture is the seam of the non leaking side. Second picture you can an obvious defect in the seam which was the source of the leak. The white stuff in the pictures is just the soap used for testing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Best idea ever, very short term success
customer_reviews.text: As the title says, I LOVE this idea! And it works absolutely perfectly. I use it for a 90lb dog, for her comfort while traveling. I was absolutely elated until it started to lose air, needing to be refilled almost every day. And eventually, just lost ALL air. And definitely not treated roughly at all. We always had multiple blankets on top. It really was a slow and steady decline. I've now purchased a product twice as expensive from another company. It's a different material. I've gone through this exact same issue with regular air mattresses, never having any long-term luck. But the TPE (?) ones, rather than pvc, definitely last longer, though again not nearly long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent in Oakland, CA

customer_reviews.title: Easily punctured
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take on a 3000 mile road trip with my 3 weiner dogs, so they would have more room to move around. It kept air good but about half way through the trip, the piece that sticks up between the seats got cut by one of the dogs toenails which are not long. Sad that this didn’t last. Will be looking for a more heavy duty one to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: good idea
customer_reviews.text: not really products fault the issue is in a small car still doesn't give you room to sleep comfortably so good for dog or small people
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Quick Setup
customer_reviews.text: It came with 2 sets of eye covers which were a surprise for me. It is quite comfortable. You don't hear too much noise, unlike the sleeping mats. Only if the vehicle is in motion, then you may get some noise because of the friction of the airbed to the seats' surfaces. Inflating and deflating is so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Ikbal

customer_reviews.title: It is soft and comfortable to sleep at night
customer_reviews.text: It is going inflate one day after, but it is better than sleeping on the back seats with a curve. I got a good night sleep when I camp with my friends.
customer_reviews.author: CCCHI

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy.
customer_reviews.text: Went flat in less than an hour. I got an email saying that this is normal? And to just re-inflate? Um don’t think so. Don’t buy. Was able to return item with no problems though.
customer_reviews.author: Cobsely

customer_reviews.title: Was great on my long road trip
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was taking a road trip across the US and Canada, and wanted a backup plan for where to sleep in case there were nights I couldn't find a place to stay. I was pleasantly surprised with how comfortable it was and how well I slept - it fit in my car perfectly too. It does lose air fairly quickly, even with no pressure on it, but overall, I am very satisfied with this product and will be taking it with me on all my trips in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Halstead

customer_reviews.title: "Brand new" hole included.
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be a surprise for my husband who travels for work weekly. Sadly it came with a huge hole down one side, therefore inflating it was obviously not an option. Such a huge disappointment and on top of it all the seller will not return my money.
customer_reviews.author: Emilio and Laura

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommed it.
customer_reviews.text: After being air filled, somehow it slowly disinflates. Sorry I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good product
customer_reviews.text: I just got a resend order from the seller as I had received an order that has a leaking problem on my first order. I reported the problem and then the seller made a right thing for me resending the new one. The product is great, worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Florence Ann

customer_reviews.title: Road trip comfort
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly this bed was quite comfortable. We used it at nap time for my nieces. I tried it out for a few minutes. It's good for adults also. We had a very good road trip. This was a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Scott

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit my Honda CRV!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2018 Honda CRV and this mattress would not fit properly. It inflated easily but the “ legs” were too short and did not reach the floor. The mattress itself did not reach the backs of the rear seats no matter how I adjusted both the front and rear seats themselves. I was unable to try the mattress out for comfort and returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: gleed

customer_reviews.title: Great for in a pinch.  Blows up in seconds!
customer_reviews.text: Great for in a pinch. Blows up in seconds! I put pump up to nossel no adapters and it blows it up super fast.
customer_reviews.author: Clifton Ray Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Barely used
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and didn't use it. Only put it in the car once to see if it would work. It does but never used it again.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: It deflated right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Woke up to a deflated bed only after a couple hours of use. Returned to amazon for a replacement, then I just filled the bed up and let it sit, didn’t even use it. Few hours later it lost most of the air again. It’s useless and not worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Justin S.

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the backseat of my Camry to give the dogs in the back more space. I placed it under the seat cover and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Honest reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Worse product ever
customer_reviews.text: The very first day we used it, it lasted for 3 minutes, neither one of the chambers hold the air.... don't buy!
customer_reviews.author: Francisco L. Forero

customer_reviews.title: As described easy to store.
customer_reviews.text: This SUV bed for perfect. Would highly recommend.. I would like to see it with an ac inflater also.
customer_reviews.author: C in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeper for Aduldt, or kids on Long trip
customer_reviews.text: Used it on a trip from NY to Missouri (1200 miles), my wife slept like a baby, very comfy tidy, and neat in our 2017 CR-V
customer_reviews.author: Calvin

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: Used this air mattress in the back seat of my truck. Was a bit leery about getting any sort of sleep but pleasantly surprised at how comfortable the mattress was and how fast I fell asleep. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as intended.
customer_reviews.text: This worked okay the first few nights I tried it, but I took it back out to use again a few months later and it now deflates every hour or so and is extremely uncomfortable to try and sleep on. I was very satisfied with this product at first but the materials apparently are not made to last. This was extremely disappointing...
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Teboe

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money unless is for a couple of nights & is worth it for you
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it is comfortable for 3 times of using it, only one night each time and then, it deflates and don’t hold the air. That means that is $10 a night and then throw it away, unfortunately I don’t have the box and I can’t just return it. Really, the quality is very bad! 😔😡😖
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Aponte

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: After few times of use, i couldn't be inflatable anymore.
customer_reviews.author: SELENA TRAN

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price
customer_reviews.text: I love this car air mattress. I have a Nissan Xterra and it fit perfectly in the backseat and I was very comfortable in it. I used it several times and each time it did not deflate, it kept its air inside. I was surprised I slept a full 8 hours on this.
customer_reviews.author: T.W.

customer_reviews.title: do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: not long enough to cover the back seat and hence leaves a gap at the end. loses air easily
customer_reviews.author: Brendon Dsouza

customer_reviews.title: ehh its ok
customer_reviews.text: product isn't a comfy, it seems to delate alot when you lay on it even when it is secure. It is good for naps but would not use for over night.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo S.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our Daughter for a 12 hour road trip there and 12 hours back. It's easy to inflate and stays inflated. Very easy to setup and fit perfectly in our Ford Explorer. The pump included is a bonus! Was definitely worth the investment!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good sleeping
customer_reviews.text: Went camping with it. Stayed in my truck and it was comfortable but after 3 days I had to keep blowing it up at night time
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Tibbs

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: Legs were too short to reach the floor of car. Not a big car. Toyota Acura. Wouldn't hold air. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Step Lively

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Good for sleep but warning keep things away that may puncture it or else this product is done.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D. Lane jr

customer_reviews.title: Not very good quality and deflates quick
customer_reviews.text: It deflates after about 24 hours and needs to be refilled with air or it's pointless to have in the car
customer_reviews.author: GARRETT MCCARGAR

customer_reviews.title: Just right for traveling!
customer_reviews.text: So far, he really likes it! It made a great gift for a traveling working man!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Fast to inflate Cons: Uncomfortable, pillows are small, buy or bring regular ones
customer_reviews.author: Dre

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: Works really well for car camping or swapping sleep on road trips! Convenient, inexpensive, comfortable, versatile. I have nothing but good things to say about this product!
customer_reviews.author: steff

customer_reviews.title: Airbed
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a road trip my granddaughter 6yrs old was the only one sleeping on it n got flat. The seam came on done on the leg
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: This fits my husband's truck perfectly. Great for traveling especially with kids
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: It is awesome. I am a big guy and this works great.
customer_reviews.author: Chad B.

customer_reviews.title: need wall plug
customer_reviews.text: wish it would come with a wall outlet plug aswell.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Worked well in my 2013 Chrysler 300c. Blew the uncommon fuse to the motor accidently by partially cutting off airflow however. Nothing a gum wrapper can't fix.
customer_reviews.author: Nuckenfutz

customer_reviews.title: Leaks in both chambers
customer_reviews.text: Looses air in both chambers. Have to air up every few hours. Company wanted to know where it leaked but it's so big and both chambers leaked so unable to tell. They stated that they would notify manufacturer which is no help to me with a product that has to be tended to every few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: What a product!! They even involved a eye mask for sleep. Loved the quality👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Dina Khatri

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Filled with gas, it didn't take long for it to leak!
customer_reviews.author: VINCENT ZHANG

customer_reviews.title: Great value so far
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried sleeping on it yet, but fit in the back of my Scion iA (which is a smaller sedan). Blew up fairly easily, and the cord on the pump is totally long enough to reach from the port in the car to the valves on the bed. Really glad it came with two patches for any repairs, and it even came with two eye masks (which made me giggle).
customer_reviews.author: Rhozi

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2015 Carolla, stays inflated after 2 days of use
customer_reviews.text: Fit in the back of my 2015 Toyota Corolla perfectly. Inflated and firm in under 2 mintues, and stayed firm for 2-3 days BUT... The ports for air are on the back side and the cord to the inflator doesn't reach from plug-in so I have to maneuver after inflating which can be difficult
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for sleeping in your car, makes it comfortable. Easy to inflate with the pump that plugs into the car, takes 2-3 minutes. I went on a month long road trip and this was perfect. Seems durable as well. I’ve definitely gotten my money’s worth.
customer_reviews.author: Clover

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is really good for a midsize car. Comfortable, a little tight but it is for the car. Great for long road trips.
customer_reviews.author: Winfred Manning

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sleep, fast and simple inflation
customer_reviews.text: I love that it is,so easy to inflate and takes less than 5 minutes to do so. It fit perfectly in my GMC TERRAIN. and deflating, folding and putting away were also equally fast and easy. It's lightweight and comfortable to sleep on. Definitely worth the price and then some.
customer_reviews.author: liz cornel

product_meta.title: HAITRAL Portable Travel Camping Inflatable Air Mattress with Pillow Fits Most Car Models for Camping Travel and Car, Flitaing Bed, Floating Bed (Black，Gray,Blue,Beige)
feature_bullets: ★ Flocking car air Mattress, Bed Dimension: 35.4*55*17.7 inches (after inflating)
★ Durable and strong and Inflatable convenient,Lightweight folded, easy to carry, open the bleeder valve, press and make the Air out.
★ Outdoor necessities: with 2 pillows,children, adults or pet, sleep on this car air bed very safely, comfortable and enjoy relaxed time on trip.
★ Made of thick, soft and velvety PVC oxford fabric, protable, lightweight and comfortable, perfect for camping, travel, holiday and other outside activities.

★ Fits most car models, Saloon car, SUV, MPV, except for the Lengthen Lincolns, Trucks and minibus,perfect for camping, travel, festivals, surf trips and adventures Inflatable mattress flat, wide and comfortable.
